name: Jewel Quest Mysteries: Curse of the Emerald Tear
name_original: Jewel Quest Mysteries: Curse of the Emerald Tear
description:
Jewel Quest Mysteries: Curse of the Emerald Tear is a puzzle game developed by 3 Blokes Studios. It was originally released in 2008. iWin published the game.
Jewel Quest Mysteries: Curse of the Emerald Tear is available on PC.
